entry.title: 算法与数据结构Java
entry.content:
线性表

package Java;import java.util.Iterator;/** * 线性表 */public class SequenceList<T> implements Iterable<T>{    //存储元素的数组    private T[] eles;    //当前顺序表中的元素个数N    private int N;    //构造方法，容量为capacity    public SequenceList(int capacity) {        eles=(T[])new Object[capacity];        N=0;    }    //空置线性表    public void clear(){        N=0;    }    //判断线性表是否为空，是返回true，否返回false    public boolean isEmpty(){        return N==0;    }    //获取线性表中元素个数    public int length(){        return N;    }    //读取并且返回线性表中第i个元素的值    public T get(int i){        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("当前元素不存在！");        }        return eles[i];    }    //在线性表的第i个元素之后插入一个值为t的数据元素    public void insert(int i,T t){        if(N==eles.length){            resize(eles.length*2);        }        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("插入位置不合法");        }        for (int j = N; j > i; j--) {            eles[j]=eles[j-1];        }        eles[i]=t;        N++;    }    //向线性表中添加一个元素t    public void insert(T t){        if(N==eles.length){            resize(eles.length*2);        }        eles[N++] = t;    }    //删除并返回线性表中第i个数据元素    public T remove(int i){        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("当前元素不存在！");        }        T result = eles[i];        for(int j=i;j<N-1;j++){            eles[j] = eles[j + 1];        }        return result;    }    //返回线性表中首次出现指定数据元素的位序号，若不存在，则返回-1    public int indexOf(T t){        for (int i = 0; i < N - 1; i++) {            if (eles[i].equals(t)) {                return i;            }        }        return -1;    }    //改变容量    private void resize(int newSize){        T[] temp = eles;        eles = (T[])new Object[newSize];        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {            eles[i] = temp[i];        }    }    @Override    public Iterator<T> iterator() {        return new SIterator();    }    private class SIterator implements Iterator{        private int cur;        public SIterator() {            this.cur = 0;        }        @Override        public boolean hasNext() {            return cur<N;        }        @Override        public T next() {            return eles[cur++];        }    }}

单链表

package Java;import java.util.Iterator;/** * 单链表 */public class LinkList<T> implements Iterable {    //内部结点类    private class Node<T> {        public T item;        public Node next;        public Node(T item, Node next) {            this.item = item;            this.next = next;        }    }    //头结点    private Node head;    //链表长度    private int N;    public LinkList() {        head = new Node(null, null);        N = 0;    }    //清空链表    public void clear(){        head.next = null;        N = 0;    }    //判断链表是否为空    public boolean isEmpty(){        return N == 0;    }    //获取链表中元素个数    public int getLength(){        return N;    }    //读取并且返回 第i个元素值    public T get(int i){        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("位置不合法");        }        Node result = head;        for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {            result =result.next;        }        return (T) result.item;    }    //向链表中添加一个元素    public void insert(T t){        Node n = head;        while(n.next!=null){            n = n.next;        }        n.next=new Node(t,null);        N++;    }    //在链表第i个元素前插入一个元素    public void insert(int i,T t){        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("位置不合法");        }        Node n = head;        for (int j = 0; j < i-1; j++) {            n = n.next;        }        Node newNode = new Node(t, n.next);        n.next = newNode;        N++;    }    //删除并返回第i个元素    public T remove(int i){        if(i<0||i>N){            throw new RuntimeException("位置不合法");        }        Node pre = head;        for (int j = 0; j < i-1; j++) {            pre = pre.next;        }        Node result = pre.next;        pre.next = result.next;        return (T) result.item;    }    //返回链表中首次出现指定元素的序号。不存在返回-1    public int indexOf(T t){        Node n = head;        for (int i = 1; n.next != null; i++) {            n = n.next;            if (n.item.equals(t)) {                return i;            }        }        return -1;    }    @Override    public Iterator iterator() {        return new LIterator();    }    private class LIterator implements Iterator<T>{        private LinkList.Node n;        @Override        public boolean hasNext() {            return n.next != n;        }        @Override        public T next() {            n = n.next;            return (T) n.item;        }    }}

栈

package Java;import java.util.Iterator;/** * 栈 */public class Stack<T> implements Iterable {    //链表结构    private class Node<T> {        public T item;        public Node next;        public Node(T item, Node next) {            this.item = item;            this.next = next;        }    }    //首结点    private Node head;    //元素个数    private int N;    //构造方法    public Stack() {        head = new Node(null, null);        N=0;    }    //判断栈是否为空    public boolean isEmpty(){        return N==0;    }    //获取栈中元素个数    public int size(){        return N;    }    //弹出栈顶元素    public T pop(){        Node oldNext = head.next;        if (oldNext == null) {            return null;        }        head.next = oldNext.next;        return (T) oldNext.item;    }    //向栈中压入元素t    public void push(T t){        Node node = new Node(t, head.next);        head.next = node;        N++;    }    private class SIterator implements Iterator{        private Node n = head;        @Override        public boolean hasNext() {            return n.next!=null;        }        @Override        public Object next() {            Node node = n.next;            n = n.next;            return node;        }    }    @Override    public Iterator iterator() {        return null;    }}

队列

package Java;import org.w3c.dom.Node;import java.util.Iterator;/** * 队列 */public class Queue<T> implements Iterable<T> {    //内部结点类    private class Node{        public T item;        public Node next;        public Node(T item, Node next) {            this.item = item;            this.next = next;        }    }    //首结点    private Node head;    //尾结点    private Node last;    //元素个数    private int N;    public Queue() {        this.head = new Node(null,null);        last = head;        N=0;    }    //判断队列是否为空    public boolean isEmpty(){        return N==0;    }    //获取队列中元素个数    //获取栈中元素个数    public int size(){        return N;    }    //从队列中拿出一个元素    public T deQueue() {        if (isEmpty()) {            return null;        }        Node oldFirst = head.next;        head.next = oldFirst.next;        N--;        return oldFirst.item;    }    //往队列中插入一个元素    public void enQueue(T t){        last.next = new Node(t, null);        last = last.next;        N++;    }    public class QIterator implements Iterator{        private Queue.Node n = head;        @Override        public boolean hasNext() {            return n.next!=null;        }        @Override        public Object next() {            Queue.Node node = n.next;            n=n.next;            return node.next;        }    }    @Override    public Iterator<T> iterator() {        return null;    }}

二叉树

package Java;/** * 二叉树 */public class BinaryTree<Key extends Comparable<Key>,Value> {    //内部结点类    private class Node{        //存储键        public Key key;        //存储值        private Value value;        //左子结点        public Node left;        //右子结点        public Node right;        //构造方法        public Node(Key key, Value value, Node left, Node right) {            this.key = key;            this.value = value;            this.left = left;            this.right = right;        }    }    //根结点    private Node root;    //元素个数    private int N;    public BinaryTree() {        N = 0;    }    //获取树中元素个数    public int size(){        return N;    }    //向树中插入一个键值对    public void put(Key key,Value value){        root = put(root, key, value);    }    //给指定树x上添加一个键值对，并且返回添加后的新树    public Node put(Node x, Key key, Value value) {        //如果结点为空        if(x==null){            N++;            //创造一个新的结点，该结点左右子树为空            return new Node(key,value,null,null);        }        int cmp = key.compareTo(x.key);        //如果结点的key小于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的左子树        if (cmp < 0) {            x.left = put(x.left, key, value);        }        //如果结点的key大于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的右子树        else if (cmp > 0) {            x.right = put(x.right, key, value);        }        //如果key等与当前结点的key,替换当前结点的值        else {            x.value = value;        }        return x;    }    //根据key从树中找出对应的值    public Value get(Key key){        return get(root, key);    }    //从指定树中，找到key对应的值    public Value get(Node x, Key key) {        if (x == null) {            return null;        }        int cmp = key.compareTo(x.key);        //如果结点的key小于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的左子树        if (cmp < 0) {            return get(x.left, key);        }        //如果结点的key大于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的右子树        else if (cmp > 0) {            return get(x.right, key);        }        //如果key等与当前结点的key,替换当前结点的值        else {            return x.value;        }    }    //根据key，删除树中对应键值对    public void delete(Key key) {        root = delete(root, key);    }    //删除指定树x上的键为key的键值对，并返回删除后的新树    public Node delete(Node x, Key key) {        if (x == null) {            return null;        }        int cmp = key.compareTo(x.key);        if (cmp < 0) {            //如果key小于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的左子树            x.left = delete(x.left, key);        } else if (cmp > 0) {            //如果key大于当前结点的key，继续找当前结点的右子树            x.right = delete(x.right, key);        }else {            //如果找到结点            if (x.left == null) {                //当前结点没有左子树                return x.right;            } else if (x.right == null) {                //当前结点没有右子树                return x.left;            }else {                //当前结点既有左子树又有右子树，找到右子树最小的值                Node minNode = x.right;                Node pre = x;                while (minNode.left != null) {                    pre = minNode;                    minNode = minNode.left;                }                //删除最小结点                if (minNode.right != null) {                    pre.left = minNode.right;                }                minNode.left = x.left;                minNode.right = x.right;                x = minNode;                N--;            }        }        return x;    }    //对二叉树进行遍历    //前序遍历    private Queue<Key> preOrder() {        Queue<Key> keys = new Queue<>();        preOrder(root, keys);        return keys;    }       private void preOrder(Node x, Queue<Key> keys) {        if (x == null) {            return;        }        //将当前结点放入队列keys        keys.enQueue(x.key);        //找到当前结点的左子树，如果不为空，递归遍历左子树        if (x.left != null) {            preOrder(x.left,keys);        }        //找到当前结点的右子树，如果不为空，递归遍历右子树        if (x.right != null) {            preOrder(x.right, keys);        }    }        //中序遍历    private Queue<Key> midOrder() {        Queue<Key> keys = new Queue<>();        midOrder(root, keys);        return keys;    }    private void midOrder(Node x, Queue<Key> keys) {        if (x == null) {            return;        }        //找到当前结点的左子树，如果不为空，递归遍历左子树        if (x.left != null) {            midOrder(x.left,keys);        }        //将当前结点放入队列keys        keys.enQueue(x.key);        //找到当前结点的右子树，如果不为空，递归遍历右子树        if (x.right != null) {            midOrder(x.right, keys);        }    }        //后序遍历    private Queue<Key> afterOrder() {        Queue<Key> keys = new Queue<>();        afterOrder(root, keys);        return keys;    }    private void afterOrder(Node x, Queue<Key> keys) {        if (x == null) {            return;        }        //找到当前结点的左子树，如果不为空，递归遍历左子树        if (x.left != null) {            afterOrder(x.left,keys);        }        //找到当前结点的右子树，如果不为空，递归遍历右子树        if (x.right != null) {            afterOrder(x.right, keys);        }        //将当前结点放入队列keys        keys.enQueue(x.key);    }    }

AVLTree AVL树，平衡二叉树

package Java;/** * AVL树，平衡二叉树 */public class AVLTree<K extends Comparable<K>, V> {    //内部结点类    private class Node{        //键        private K key;        //值        private V value;        //高度        private int height;        //左子树，右子树，父亲结点        private Node left,right,parent;        //构造方法        public Node(K key, V value) {            this.key = key;            this.value = value;            height = 1;        }        //更新结点高度        private void updateHeight(){            int leftHeight = left == null ? 0 : left.getHeight();            int rightHeight = right == null ? 0 : right.getHeight();            height = 1 + Math.max(leftHeight, rightHeight);        }        //获取平衡度        private int getBalanceFactor() {            int leftHeight = left == null ? 0 : left.getHeight();            int rightHeight = right == null ? 0 : right.getHeight();            return leftHeight - rightHeight;        }        //get,set方法        public K getKey() {            return key;        }        public void setKey(K key) {            this.key = key;        }        public V getValue() {            return value;        }        public void setValue(V value) {            this.value = value;        }        public int getHeight() {            return height;        }        public void setHeight(int height) {            this.height = height;        }        public Node getLeft() {            return left;        }        public void setLeft(Node left) {            this.left = left;        }        public Node getRight() {            return right;        }        public void setRight(Node right) {            this.right = right;        }        public Node getParent() {            return parent;        }        public void setParent(Node parent) {            this.parent = parent;        }        public void setKeyAndValue(K key, V value) {            setKey(key);            setValue(value);        }        @Override        public String toString() {            return "Node{" +                    "key=" + key +                    ", value=" + value +                    '}';        }    }    //结点个数    private int size;    //根结点    private Node root;    //AVL树构造方法    public AVLTree() {        size = 0;        root = null;    }    //左旋    private Node leftRotate(Node node) {        Node rightNode = node.getRight();        node.setRight(rightNode.getLeft());        rightNode.setLeft(node);        node.setParent(rightNode);        if (node.getRight() != null) {            node.getRight().setParent(node);        }        node.updateHeight();        rightNode.updateHeight();        return rightNode;    }    //右旋    private Node rightRotate(Node node) {        Node leftNode = node.getLeft();        node.setLeft(leftNode.getRight());        leftNode.setRight(node);        node.setParent(leftNode);        if (node.getLeft() != null) {            node.getLeft().setParent(node);        }        node.updateHeight();        leftNode.updateHeight();        return leftNode;    }    //添加一个结点    private Node addNode(Node node,K key,V value) {        if (node == null) {            size++;            return new Node(key, value);        }        int cmp = key.compareTo(node.key);        if (cmp < 0) {            Node leftNode = addNode(node.getLeft(), key, value);            node.setLeft(leftNode);            leftNode.setParent(node);        } else if (cmp > 0) {            Node rightNode = addNode(node.getRight(), key, value);            node.setRight(rightNode);            rightNode.setParent(node);        } else {            node.setValue(value);        }        return reBalance(node);    }    //恢复平衡    private Node reBalance(Node node) {        int bf = node.getBalanceFactor();        //左子树高        if (bf > 1) {            Node leftNode = node.getLeft();            int leftBf = leftNode.getBalanceFactor();            if (leftBf > 0) {                //LL型                //右旋                node = rightRotate(node);            }else{                //LR型                //先左旋，再右旋                node.setLeft(leftRotate(node.getLeft()));                node = rightRotate(node);            }        } else if (bf < -1) {            //右子树高            Node rightNode = node.getRight();            int rightBf = rightNode.getBalanceFactor();            if (rightBf > 0) {                node.setRight(rightRotate(node.getRight()));                node = leftRotate(node);            } else {                node = leftRotate(node);            }        }        //更新高度        node.updateHeight();        //返回平衡好的结点        return node;    }        //删除结点    private  Node deleteNode(Node node,K key) {        if (node == null) {            return null;        }        int cmp = key.compareTo(node.getKey());        if (cmp < 0) {            Node leftNode = deleteNode(node.getLeft(), key);            node.setLeft(leftNode);            if (leftNode != null) {                leftNode.setParent(node);            }        } else if (cmp > 0) {            Node rightNode = deleteNode(node.getRight(), key);            node.setRight(rightNode);            if (rightNode != null) {                rightNode.setParent(node);            }        }else {            if (node.getLeft() == null && node.getRight() == null) {                if (node.getRight() == null) {                    setRoot(null);                }                return null;            } else if (node.getLeft() == null) {                node.getRight().setParent(node.getParent());                if (node.getParent() == null) {                    setRoot(node.getRight());                }                return node.getRight();            } else if (root.getRight() == null) {                node.getLeft().setParent(node.getParent());                if (node.getParent() == null) {                    setRoot(node.getLeft());                }                return node.getLeft();            }else {                Node rightNode = node.getRight();                Node minNode = node.getRight();                Node pre = node;                while (minNode.getLeft() != null) {                    pre = minNode;                    minNode = minNode.getLeft();                }                //删除最小结点                if (minNode.getRight() != null) {                    pre.setLeft(minNode.getRight());                    minNode.getRight().setParent(pre);                }                minNode.setLeft(node.getLeft());                node.getLeft().setParent(minNode);                minNode.setRight(node.getRight());                node.getParent().setParent(minNode);                node = minNode;                size--;            }        }        root.updateHeight();        return reBalance(node);    }    public void addNode(K key, V value) {        if (root == null) {            setRoot(new Node(key,value));            getRoot().setParent(null);        }        size++;    }    public int getSize() {        return size;    }    public void setSize(int size) {        this.size = size;    }    public Node getRoot() {        return root;    }    public void setRoot(Node root) {        this.root = root;    }    public boolean isEmpty() {        return size == 0;    }}

entry.title: JDBC
entry.content:
JDBC编程六步

注册驱动 (告诉java程序，即将连接那个品牌的数据库)

Driver driver = new com.mysql.jdbc.Driver();DriverManager.registerDriver(driver);或class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Drive")

获取连接 (JVM的进程和数据库之间的通道打开)

String url = "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/库名";String user = "root";String password = "密码";Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url,user,password);

获取数据库操作对象 

Statement stmt = conn.createStatement();

执行SQL语句

String sql = "";int count = stmt.executeUpdate(sql);

处理查询结果集 (只有第四步执行的是select语句的时候，才有第五步处理查询结果集)

ResultSet rs = null;String sql = "select ..."rs = stmt.executeQuery(sql); //专门执行DQL语句while(rs.next){    String empno = rs.getString(1); //获取第一列    String empno = rs.getString("empno");//获取第一列(推荐这种)，是查询结果集的列名称    String ename = rs.getString(2);    //还可以以特定类型取出，getDouble(),getInt()等    System.out.println(empno+ename);}

释放资源

stmt.close();conn.close();

获取连接的五种方式

  • 方式一

Driver driver = new com.mysql.jdbc.Driver();String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";Properties info = new Properties();info.setProperty("user","root");info.setProperty("password","123456")                Connection connect = driver.connect(url, info);

  • 方式二

Class clazz = Class.forName("new com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");Driver driver = (Driver) clazz.newInstance();String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";Properties info = new Properties();info.setProperty("user","root");info.setProperty("password","123456");Connection connect = driver.connect(url, info);

  • 方式三

Class clazz = Class.forName("new com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");Driver driver = (Driver) clazz.newInstance();String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";String user = "root";String password = "123456";DriverManager.registerDriver(driver);Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);

  • 方式四

Class.forName("new com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/test";String user = "root";String password = "123456";Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);

  • 方式五

InputStream is = ConnecrionTest.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");Properties properties = new Properties();properties.load(is);String user = properties.getProperty("user");String password = properties.getProperty("password");String url = properties.getProperty("url");String driverClass = properties.getProperty("driverClass");Class.forName(driverClass);Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);

通用操作

public class JDBCUtils {    /*获取数据库连接*/    public static Connection getConnection() throws Exception{        InputStream is = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");        Properties properties = new Properties();        properties.load(is);        String user = properties.getProperty("user");        String password = properties.getProperty("password");        String url = properties.getProperty("url");        String driverClass = properties.getProperty("driverClass");        Class.forName(driverClass);        Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);        return connection;    }    /*关闭连接和Statemen*/    public static void closeResource(Connection conn, Statement stmt) {        try {            stmt.close();        } catch (SQLException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        try {            conn.close();        } catch (SQLException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    }    /*通用的增删改操作*/    public void update(String sql, Object... args) {        Connection connection = null;        PreparedStatement ps = null;        try {            //获取数据库连接            connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();            //预编译            ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql);            //填充占位符            for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {                ps.setObject(i + 1, args[0]);            }            //执行            ps.execute();        } catch (Exception e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }finally {            //资源关闭            JDBCUtils.closeResource(connection,ps);        }    }}

DAO

DAO(Data Access Object)是一个数据访问接口，数据访问：顾名思义就是与数据库打交道。夹在业务逻辑与数据库资源中间。DAO是把对数据库的操作全部封装在里面。DAO把底层的数据访问逻辑和高层的业务逻辑分开.实现DAO模式能够更加专注于编写数据访问代码.

public abstract class DataBaseDao<T> {    protected  Class<T> klass;//实例化子类时，获取泛型类型    {        Type genericSuperclass = this.getClass().getGenericSuperclass();        ParameterizedType parameterizedType = (ParameterizedType) genericSuperclass;        Type[] actualTypeArguments = parameterizedType.getActualTypeArguments();        klass = (Class<T>) actualTypeArguments[0];    }    public List<Object> query(Connection connection, String sql, Object ...values) {        List<Object> res = new ArrayList<>();        PreparedStatement statement = null;        try {            statement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);            setSqlValues(statement,values);            ResultSet resultSet = statement.executeQuery();            ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();            while(resultSet.next()) {                Object object = klass.newInstance();                int size = metaData.getColumnCount();                for (int i = 1; i <= size; ++i) {                    Object value = resultSet.getObject(i);                    if (value == null) {                        continue;                    }                    setObjectValues(metaData.getColumnLabel(i),object,value);                }                res.add(object);            }        } catch (SQLException throwables) {            throwables.printStackTrace();        } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        } catch (InstantiationException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        } finally {            ConnectToDataBase.closeResource(null,statement);        }        return res;    }// 反射使用成员的set方法，    private void setObjectValues(String propertyName,Object object,Object value) {        String methodName =  "set" + propertyName.substring(0,1).toUpperCase()                + propertyName.substring(1);        try {            Method method = klass.getMethod(methodName,klass.getDeclaredField(propertyName).getType());            method.invoke(object,value);        } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {        }    }    private void setSqlValues(PreparedStatement statement,Object ...values) throws SQLException {        if (values != null) {            for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {                statement.setObject(i + 1,values[i]);            }        }    }    public void update(Connection connection,String sql, Object ...values) {        PreparedStatement statement = null;        try {            statement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);            setSqlValues(statement,values);            statement.execute();        } catch (SQLException throwables) {            throwables.printStackTrace();        } finally {            ConnectToDataBase.closeResource(null,statement);        }    }}
